latin_title: Passio Petri et Pauli in Ps.-Hegesippi historia

bibliography_entries.line_html: The Passion of Peter and Paul is generally present in manuscripts of DEH, though a thorough study of this has yet to be undertaken (indeed, no comprehensive list of manuscripts of DEH yet exists). The following list includes those manuscripts used in previous critical editions along with several other early witnesses (prior to 12th cent.) noted by Pollard (2015, p. 80) and Gitner (forthcoming).
